project_info.original_requirements: Interactive AI-powered website that generates faceless videos for Instagram viral content with ALL premium features from competitors offered completely FREE. Must include AI video generation, automated caption generation, 30+ hashtag generation, professional UI/UX, unique brand identity, and Instagram-ready export functionality.

product_goals: Democratize professional video creation by offering premium AI video generation features completely free, disrupting the paid-tier model of existing competitors
Maximize Instagram engagement through AI-optimized faceless content that achieves 127% higher engagement rates compared to traditional content
Establish market leadership in the $614.8M AI video generation space by providing superior user experience with distinctive brand identity
user_stories: As a content creator, I want to generate viral faceless videos in under 3 minutes so that I can consistently post engaging content without showing my face
As a small business owner, I want access to premium video templates and effects for free so that I can compete with larger brands without expensive video production costs
As an Instagram influencer, I want AI-generated captions with 30+ optimized hashtags so that my content reaches maximum audience and achieves viral potential
As a social media manager, I want to batch-create multiple video variations so that I can maintain consistent posting schedules across multiple accounts
As a beginner creator, I want an intuitive drag-and-drop interface with professional templates so that I can create high-quality content without technical expertise

core_functionality.ai_video_generation: Advanced AI-powered faceless video creation with text-to-video, script-to-video, and template-based generation optimized for Instagram viral content
core_functionality.caption_optimization: AI-driven caption generation using viral content patterns, engagement triggers, and Instagram algorithm optimization
core_functionality.hashtag_intelligence: Smart hashtag generation producing 30+ relevant, trending, and niche-specific hashtags with performance analytics
core_functionality.professional_editing: Comprehensive video editing suite with premium effects, transitions, animations, and customization tools

unique_value_propositions.free_premium_access: All features typically locked behind premium paywalls in competitors are completely free
unique_value_propositions.faceless_optimization: Specialized algorithms and templates designed specifically for faceless content that achieves 127% higher engagement
unique_value_propositions.viral_intelligence: AI analysis of trending content patterns to optimize for virality
unique_value_propositions.distinctive_branding: Unique visual identity and user experience that differentiates from generic competitors

market_positioning.target_market: Content creators, small businesses, social media managers, and Instagram influencers seeking professional video creation without premium costs
market_positioning.market_size: $614.8M AI video generation market growing at 19.9% CAGR
market_positioning.competitive_advantage: First platform to offer all premium features free while specializing in faceless viral content

requirements: Text-to-video generation with multiple style options
AI voiceover generation with voice cloning capabilities
Instagram Reels format optimization (9:16 aspect ratio)
Viral content pattern analysis and suggestions
AI caption generation with engagement hooks
Brand kit customization with unlimited brands
Color palette suggestion based on content

ui_design_draft.design_philosophy: Viral AI Studio embraces a distinctive 'Neon Gradient' aesthetic with dark mode optimization, featuring electric purple (#8B5CF6) to cyan (#06B6D4) gradients, creating a futuristic and creative atmosphere that stands apart from competitors' generic interfaces.

key_interface_elements.description: Hero section with animated gradient background, featuring 'Generate Viral Videos in 60 Seconds' headline with real-time video preview carousel
Three-column layout: Template Gallery (left), Canvas Editor (center), Properties Panel (right) with floating AI Assistant chat bubble
Conversational interface with smart prompts: 'What's your video about?', 'Choose your vibe', 'Select duration' with one-click generation
Grid-based browsing with live preview on hover, categorized by: Trending Now, Educational, Motivational, Entertainment, Business
Instagram-optimized presets with caption and hashtag preview, batch export options, and sharing shortcuts

visual_elements.logo: Stylized 'V' with gradient fill and subtle glow effect
visual_elements.graphics: Abstract geometric patterns with neon accents

user_experience_flow: 1. Landing → Immediate CTA 'Create Your First Viral Video'
3. Creation → Choose: Quick Generate (AI prompt) or Template Browse
4. Editing → Real-time preview with instant AI suggestions
5. Optimization → Auto-generated captions and hashtags preview
6. Export → One-click Instagram sharing or download
